post.body: alright thats cool. ur too awesome to talk to me now. grow up. youre still a nobody sweetheart
adams dog just farted on my leg. i dreamt me and rihanna went and got our noses pierced and went to disneyland then had a sleepover. wtf
things are 90% better now. best new years ever. no vomit. no drama. just me, adam, apple cider, and reno 911.
Adam's not pooping til next year. My hero
and if this is what it takes just to lye with my mistakes and live with what i did to you all the hell i put you through
skeleton key - margo and the nuclear so and so's. story of my life

It's the wrong time he's pulling me through It's a small crime And I've got no excuse
Leave me out with the waste This is not what I'd do
You know if you put a burger in a toaster it will say . . . Happy birthday! Haha
well i woke up this morning. rainbow filled the sky. it was god telling me, well everything is gonna be alright.
this creeping fog is so eerie. i won't get to say goodbye to 2008's sky
: ] here comes the sun do do do do
been throwing up all night and morning. watched garden state twice. and mean girls. i cant listen to music for the first time ever.
u have to let me in. you have to give me another chance. text me back im dying
